member.name: T:Innovative.Holiday.FederalHolidayRule
member.summary: Adjusts a holiday date per the US federal holiday rule. If the holiday falls on a Saturday, it is observed on the previous Friday. If the holiday falls on a Sunday, it is observed on the next Monday.

member.name: M:Innovative.Holiday.FederalHolidayRule.AdjustedDate(System.DateTime)
member.returns: Returns the adjusted date of this holiday.
